steps: Flop Q72r: BTN small_cbet_33 ~1.9bb, BB calls (pot ~9.4bb)
River 7 pairs, draws miss: BTN big_bet_75 ~7.0bb polar; alt thin value line is size_down_dry
BTN opens 2.3bb, SB 3-bets to 11bb, BTN calls (pot ~23.5bb, SPR ~3.8)
Flop Q73r: SB checks some mediums, plans polarization later
Turn A shifts nut share to SB: choose half_pot_50 ~11.8bb or big_bet_75 ~17.6bb by blockers
River K scare: SB triple_barrel_scare when narrative and blockers align; otherwise check
Flop J84dd: CO checks back to control; Turn 2c: BB bets big polar (proxy big_bet_75)
River bricks diamonds: defend with call when blocking value/unblocking bluffs; fold without blockers
Earlier streets OOP: prefer protect_check_range on middling boards to avoid facing polar rivers
